## Conditions type

A record of condition names, each mapping to a hook id or a logical combination using `and`<!-- -->, `or`<!-- -->, and `not` operators.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type Conditions<ConditionName extends string> = Branded<Record<ConditionName, Condition<HookId>>, "Conditions">;
```
**References:** [Branded](./react.branded.md)<!-- -->, [Condition](./react.condition.md)<!-- -->, [HookId](./react.hookid.md)
